title: Knight Moves
description: The Award-Winning horror comedy series continues with more funny vampires, more bloodshed, and more body hair!In the third installment of The Black Knight Chronicles, vampire detectives Jimmy Black and Greg Knightwood find another vampire (or more) playing in their Charlotte NC sandbox, and the boys are NOT happy about it.While tracking down the killer of a young college student, they encounter boobytraps, defenestration, coeds, a werewolf bounty hunter, and worst of all - game night at a comic shop!
author: John G. Hartness
